meanings.definition: A person highly skilled in a particular art or field.
meanings.sent1: The virtuosos of the piano played a beautiful concerto.
meanings.sent2: The virtuosos in the orchestra captivated the audience with their talent.
meanings.sent3: The virtuosos of cooking whipped up a delicious feast in no time.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced on the piano keys like virtuosos performing a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The young virtuosos of the violin practiced diligently to perfect their craft.
